root.name: Lights Out
root.description: Lights Out was the pack-in title for Tiger's Game.com handheld console.Â A recreation of a dedicated Lights Out handheld Tiger had released in 1995 (itself a re-imagined version of Parker Brother's Merlin from the 70s), Lights Out took place on a 5 x 5 grid and had players trying to get all the lights to turn off. Turning a light on would turn adjacent lights off, and vice versa.
